item.title: [PI] Help with a Method [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @ShuffleScape ShuffleScape
item.description:
@ShuffleScape wrote:

Ok well yeah, I added everything you said and it still doesn’t make it time to show it… You know why ? Like I’d need it to let it time to show and player would need to click on the “Click here to continue” (I think you talked about how to fix it in the last posts, but it been like 24 hours so I don’t remember a lot.

PlayerSave class

} else if (token.equals("previewState")) { p.earningPotential = Integer.parseInt(token2);

characterfile.write("previewState = ", 0, 15); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.previewState), 0, Integer.toString(p.previewState).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Added this in PlayerAssistant in addStarter method (so when they first join the server)

[code=Java]if (c.previewState > 0) {
c.serverPreview(c.previewState);
} else {
return;
}

c.serverPreview(1);[/code]

DialogueHandler class

case 72: sendNpcChat4(//wont show it but its alright c.nextChat = 0; if (c.previewState != 0) { c.serverPreview(c.previewState++); } break; case 73: sendNpcChat4(//wont show it but its alright c.nextChat = 0; if (c.previewState != 0) { c.serverPreview(c.previewState++); } break; case 74: sendNpcChat4(//wont show it but its alright c.nextChat = 0; if (c.previewState != 0) { c.serverPreview(c.previewState++); } break;

In Client class

public void serverPreview(int index) { if (index == 1) { getDH().sendDialogues(72, 2244); spinCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);//home } else if (index == 2) { teleportToX = 2630; teleportToY = 3496; getDH().sendDialogues(73, 2244); spinCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);//hunter/agility } else if (index == 3) { teleportToX = 2846; teleportToY = 3438; getDH().sendDialogues(74, 2244); spinCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);//skill tele previewState = 0; } }

In Player class

Thank you !

item.title: [PI] Help with a Method [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @ShuffleScape ShuffleScape
item.description:
@ShuffleScape wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]public int previewState;
On account creation, set it to 1.
After the previews, set it to 0.[/quote]

I need to put it into the saving thing for characters right ? In PlayerSave class ?

So, I just put in Player class public int previewState; , I put previewState in PlayerSave too for character saving and after the preview. Where do I set it to 1 though ? I thought it was in Player class.

I set it to zero like that?

public void serverPreview(int index) { if (index == 1) { getDH().sendDialogues(72, 2244); spinCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);//home } else if (index == 2) { teleportToX = 2630; teleportToY = 3496; getDH().sendDialogues(73, 2244); spinCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);//hunter/agility } else if (index == 3) { teleportToX = 2846; teleportToY = 3438; getDH().sendDialogues(74, 2244); spinCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);//skill tele previewState = 0; } }

item.title: [PI] Help with a Method [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @ShuffleScape ShuffleScape
item.description:
@ShuffleScape wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Not at all. You wouldn’t use c.index. I only said that as a general idea.

You would define an integer in the Player class.
Let’s say you called it ‘previewState’

You would do like so;

... //Login methods ->
if (previewState > 0) {
    serverPreview(previewState);
} else
    return;

and…

public void serverPreview(int index) { if (index == 1) { getDH().sendDialogues(72, 2244); spinCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);//home } else if (index == 2) { teleportToX = 2630; teleportToY = 3496; getDH().sendDialogues(73, 2244); spinCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);//hunter/agility } else if (index == 3) { teleportToX = 2846; teleportToY = 3438; getDH().sendDialogues(74, 2244); spinCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);//skill tele } }

As well as;

case ####: if (c.previewState != 0) { c.serverPreview(c.previewState++); } break;
etc.[/quote]

And previewState would be:
public int previewState = 0
OR
public int previewState = 1?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help with a Method [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @ShuffleScape ShuffleScape
item.description:
@ShuffleScape wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Because it’s not trying to continue the method.

You’re wanting something like this;

public void serverPreview(int index) { if (index == 1) { getDH().sendDialogues(72, 2244); spinCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);//home serverPreview(2); } else if (index == 2) { teleportToX = 2630; teleportToY = 3496; getDH().sendDialogues(73, 2244); spinCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);//hunter/agility serverPreview(3); } else if (index == 3) { teleportToX = 2846; teleportToY = 3438; getDH().sendDialogues(74, 2244); spinCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);//skill tele } }[/quote]

Oh ok thank you.
And if I wanna declare it on another file, I use that ?
c.serverPreview(index);

If I use that ^, I get the index variable not found.

Also, here’s the method for stillCamera and spinCamera. Would you know how to make it so it only turn the camera all around the player ? So I can show the things around the areas.

public void stillCamera(int x, int y, int height, int speed, int angle) {
c.outStream.createFrame(177);
c.outStream.writeByte(x / 64);
c.outStream.writeByte(y / 64);
c.outStream.writeWord(height);
c.outStream.writeByte(speed);
c.outStream.writeByte(angle);
}

public void spinCamera(int x, int y, int height, int speed, int angle) {
	c.outStream.createFrame(166);
	c.outStream.writeByte(x);
	c.outStream.writeByte(y);
	c.outStream.writeWord(height);
	c.outStream.writeByte(speed);
	c.outStream.writeByte(angle);
}

public void resetCamera() {
	c.outStream.createFrame(107);
	c.updateRequired = true;
	c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

PS: these methods are not mine. Credits goes to Ramatronics on r-s

thank you again I vain I

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help with a Method [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @ShuffleScape ShuffleScape
item.description:
@ShuffleScape wrote:

So I’m trying to make it so when a new players enters in my server, it’ll display each location that I want and send a dialogue to them showing the entire server.

Here’s what I’ve done so far (getting illegal start of expression error).

public void serverPreview(){ public int order = 1; if(order == 1){ getDH().sendDialogues(72, 2244); spinCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);//home order = 2; { if(order == 2){ teleportToX = 2630; teleportToY = 3496; getDH().sendDialogues(73, 2244); spinCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);//hunter/agility order = 3; } if(order == 3){ teleportToX = 2846; teleportToY = 3438; getDH().sendDialogues(74, 2244); spinCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);//skill tele } } } }

Anyone can help me get this setup ? I mean, before, I tried to add that without the “order” int and it simply did it like in 1 second. I want to make it so I need to click on “click here to continue” to continue to the next arena.

Thanks

Read full topic
